floater.name: clear_cache
floater.title: Clear Cache
floater.text: What cache data do you wish to clear?

check_box.label: Textures
check_box.name: clear_textures
check_box.tool_tip: If checked, all texture cache data will be cleared.

check_box.label: Assets (Meshes, Sounds, Animations)
check_box.name: clear_assets
check_box.tool_tip: If checked, all asset cache data inlcuding meshes, animations, sounds, and other miscellaneous asset data will be cleared.

check_box.label: Inventory
check_box.name: clear_inventory
check_box.tool_tip: If checked, all inventory cache data will be cleared.

check_box.label: Region Objects
check_box.name: clear_regions
check_box.tool_tip: If checked, region interest list and object update cache will be cleared.

check_box.label: Shaders
check_box.name: clear_shaders
check_box.tool_tip: If checked, precompiled shader cache data will be cleared.

check_box.label: Web Data and Cookies
check_box.name: clear_web
check_box.tool_tip: If checked, all web browser data will be cleared.

check_box.label: Misc Data
check_box.name: clear_userdata
check_box.tool_tip: If checked, all mute list, experience, avatar and group name caches will be cleared.
